backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage, access control, user data, posts, ribbits, ponds, tags, likes, and activity tracking types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Interactive bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks, preventing event bubbling.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with search UI, user avatar, mobile search modal, create menu, and responsive layout behavior.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, outlet, and mobile sidebar drawer handling.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing navigation links and recent activity with lily previews and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image handling, like/share actions, and pond/user info.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with body scroll locking and animated open/close.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls, including loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile-friendly pond header with banner, profile info, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit reply with nested depth, avatar, timestamp, like actions, and a reply form.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending terms, suggestions, and an input field.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags using shared tag modules with loading states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger to render underline-style tab controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper methods to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given CSS media query currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods for ponds, profiles, search, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark mode, and custom utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides validation, normalization, and error messaging for strictly alphanumeric pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and user feedback toasts.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns error messages for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase recovery, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily cooldown tracking for view count increments using localStorage timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity context, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page explaining Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with join status, loading skeletons, and navigation to pond creation.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: UI for creating a lily post with text, image, link, pond selection, tag suggestions, validation, and form submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a pond with name, description, froggy phrase validation, image uploads, previews, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for creating posts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing lilies with trending/new sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with comments, likes, views, image lightbox, and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details, moderators, visibility, membership state, and allows users to leave the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed, loads pond and lily data, and lets users join a pond with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies, loading states, and removal options using SavedLilyItem components.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Presents top, trending, and newest tag rankings with sidebars and tab‑based navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting and canonical‑tag redirection handling.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: User settings panel supporting username changes, avatar uploads, profile updates, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, layout, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing anonymous‑friendly feature requirements and pending removal of authentication constraints.
